metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Gauntlet Soapstone, the dwarf Flaming Fist at the bottom of the Guard Tower nearby Cazador's palace.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the dwarf flaming fist nearby the Guard Tower near Cazador's palace

0.speaker: Gauntlet Soapstone
0.text: As the superior officer, I think I'll delegate  all the sentry shit to Gonfalon and catch me a nap.

1.speaker: Gauntlet Soapstone
1.text: Here I thought I'd take a little after-lunch nap, but one look at you and I've got indigestion.

2.speaker: Gauntlet Soapstone
2.text: Your sunny, smiling face convinces me that all's well and I can take a little snooze. Thanks, Sunny.
